reviews.review_msg: She's very helpful and a great ethnobotanist. However, unless you can memorize hundreds of seed for what they look like (not from a book) and their latin name then you will not do well in this class no matter how hard you work. You won't learn much about archaeobotany other then you can get eye strain from the minut seeds you'll be staring at.
really knows her stuff, and keeps it interesting.
